condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Los hogares y las comunidades de los distritos seleccionados promueven prácticas favorables para los niños a fin de mejorar la supervivencia, el desarrollo y la protección inclusivos y equitativos de las niñas, los niños y los adolescentes.

description.narrative: Despite severe constraints, the CO continues its work in the prioritized districts with a focus on reducing inequalities. The emergency situation has made it difficult to measure the impact to this date and goals had to be adjusted. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:18/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of young people and adolescents trained to train communities on child protection issues and related aspects.
Number of persons within communities trained on one or more of the 5 key interventions.
Number of services implemented within an integrated approach (Immunization+, education, HIV, child protection, essential family practices), including Covid-19 prevention
Number of families/people reached by COVID-19 prevention messages in target districts
Number of journalists and NGOs trained on preventive measures against COVID-19
Number of districts where the Integrated Package Pilot is being implemented.
